services

Class GroupService

  • java.lang.Object
    • services.GroupService

  • @Path(value="/groups/")
public class GroupService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for class Group. Retrieves information from database and posts to rest. Javadoc for put,post and delete has curl commands for testing.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    nybakk1, KnutWiig

      • getGroup

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{groupid}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public Group getGroup(@PathParam(value="groupid")
                                                                                              int groupid)
        Retrieves one group given an ID from database.
        Parameters:
        groupid - The groupId of the group requested.
        Returns:
        A Group object containing the requested group.

      • getGroups

        @GET
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.util.List<Group> getGroups()
        Returns all groups in the database.
        Returns:
        Returns the full list of groups from database.

      • getGroupInvites

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{email}/invites")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.util.ArrayList<Group> getGroupInvites(@PathParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                java.lang.String email)
        Retrieves all the groups a user is invited to join.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of user.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of groups which the user is invited to join.

      • getGroupsConnectedToMember

        @GET
 @Path(value="/list/{email}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public java.util.ArrayList<Group> getGroupsConnectedToMember(@PathParam(value="email")
                                                                                                                                        java.lang.String email)
        Retrieves all the groups a user is a member of.
        Parameters:
        email - Email of the user.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of groups.

      • addGroup

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="application/json")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addGroup(Group group)
        Adds a group to database. curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -d '{"name":"KOLLEK10V","description":null,"admin":"en@h.no"}' http://localhost:8080/scrum/rest/groups
        Parameters:
        group - The new group to be added.

      • deleteGroup

        @DELETE
 @Path(value="/{groupid}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public void deleteGroup(@PathParam(value="groupid")
                                                                                                   int groupId)
        Deletes a group from database. Change the "X" to the id of group you wish to delete. curl -v -X DELETE http://localhost:8080/scrum/rest/groups/X
        Parameters:
        groupId - Id of the group to be deleted from database.

      • updateGroup

        @PUT
 @Path(value="/{groupid}")
 @Produces(value="application/json")
public void updateGroup(Group group)
        Updates a group in the database. Change the "name" variable before testing the curl command. curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" -X POST -d '{"name":"KOLLEK10V","description":null,"admin":"en@h.no"}' http://localhost:8080/scrum/rest/groups
        Parameters:
        group - The group to be updated.

public java.util.ArrayList<StatisticsHelp> getBalance(@PathParam(value="groupId")
                                                                                                                                      int groupId)
